markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Distant Cackle](/Feats.aspx?ID=2796) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnoll" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=219" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 112 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Witch Gnoll](/Heritages.aspx?ID=169) heritage

</column>

---

It takes a very brave person to enter the laughter-haunted forest where you dwell. You can cast [_ventriloquism_](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) once per day as a 1st-level occult innate spell.
name: Distant Cackle
